tool_description: Detailed Visitor IP Data API. Get IP Address, Country, Language, Currency and more.  IP Geolocation | IP Location.
name: User IP Data REST API
title: User IP Data REST API

api_list.name: Visitor's IP data
api_list.description: This endpoint returns information about the IP address of your website's visitors. No parameters are required.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-ip-data-rest-api.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-ip-data-rest-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IP Data By IP address
api_list.description: This endpoint responds with detailed information about the IP address specified in the "ip" query parameter.

api_list.name: IP Address - JSON
api_list.description: This endpoint responds with the visitor's IP address in JSON format.
